attributes.action: give couples 3 trys of ivf treatment on the nhs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: every couple should have 3 trys of ivf/icsi treatment on the nhs

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to give couples 3 trys of ivf treatment on the nhs.

Her Majesty's Government has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.hmg.gov.uk/epetition-responses/petition-view.aspx?epref=freeivficsi


Her Majesty's Government
